sentence.Network_en: He was gifted, on occasion, with a gentle raillery, which almost always concealed a serious meaning.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一有机会, 总爱说一些温和的讥诮言词, 但几乎每次都含着严正的意义.

sentence.Network_en: Prince Charles does not escape raillery from others.
sentence.Network_cn: 查尔斯王子也难逃人们善意的嘲弄。

sentence.Network_en: The immediate target of Digger's raillery was his communications officer, a lean morose - looking southerner.
sentence.Network_cn: 迪格直接的挖苦对象,是他的通讯军官, 一个身子干瘦、愁眉苦脸的南方人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... crockery 陶瓦器 raillery 善意的嘲弄 artillery 大炮，炮兵.
materialize的翻译查词例句... ... hatchet 斧头, 手斧, 战斧 ... raillery 戏谑, 逗趣... microcosm 小宇宙, 小世界, 人类.
以y结尾的名词_百度知道 ... railway 铁路 raillery 善意的嘲笑 turkey 火鸡.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French raillerie, from railler 'to rail' (see rail)

auth_sentence.content: The poem closes with an outburst of splenetic raillery.
auth_sentence.res_content: The poem closes with an outburst of splenetic raillery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The poem closes with an outburst of splenetic raillery.
